$block: The TeamMember resource is a collection of active team members of the partitions in a user account.

$ul: **createdAt**: When the resource instance was created. This date-time is in the UTC timezone.
**dataSegmentCode**: User-provided string on which to segment and filter data. Max 50 characters.
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource instance.
**partition**: The partition that contains this resource instance. The resource cannot be moved to another partition.
**resourceOwner**: The name of the person who owns this resource.
**teamMemberRoleCode**: The role of the team member on the team.
**userAccount**: The user account that is related to this resource.
